## Client.buildUrl() method

Build a URL for the provided resource.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
buildUrl(resource: string, querystring?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resource | <code>string</code> | URL part specifying the resource to be fetched from the current version of the API. Should start by '/'. |
|  querystring | <code>string</code> | A query string to be attached to the URL. Should not start by '?'. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

A valid URL.
